website_summaries.verdict: All-in-one sushi kit that's easy to use and clean. A great kit that the whole family can use.
pros: Comes with training frame, nonstick paddle, and SushiQuik roll cutter
End caps turn into soy sauce holders
Measures out the precise amount of rice needed
Makes rolls with rice on the inside or outside
cons: Does not come with a detailed recipe book

customer_reviews.title: It puts the sticky stuff on the Nori!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I followed the directions for the rice, watched a few videos from their web site, and I was making sushi like a pro with my first batch. The secret is in the rice, make sure to follow the directions on the box and spread it thin if you're using a lot of filling. I found their rice recipe was a bit too sweet so I cut the sugar level to 1/8th cup and it was still plenty sticky. I've also started adding about 1 tsp better than bullion to the after rice cook mix, it gives the rice a nice hint of meat without the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Twombles Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy! Rice on the outside rolls!
customer_reviews.text: Made sushi for the first time last night and it was awesome!!! This thing is so easy!! I was able to make rolls w rice on the outside w no problem, just added a little water to the roll mat and voila! I purchased eel sauce and made spicy mayo and put them in squirt bottles to give the platter that restaurant look. I also added black sesame seeds to the outside of one and a very inexpensive black caviar to another. My guests and husband were all amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Mom

customer_reviews.title: Become a Sushi Master
customer_reviews.text: We made some bomb ass sushi with this kit. I gotta tell you, I have a lot more respect for sushi masters after using this for the first time. It probably took us 4 hours just to make this plate of rolls. But it was so worth it and so good. Doesn't it look like our finished product came straight form the sushi bar? You'll have to excuse us as we have not yet reached the rice-on-the-outside-of-the-roll level yet. We will get there. The directions were clear, it was easy to use, and we had a blast making sushi at home. We picked up all of our fish at the local Whole Foods and it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor R.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Sushi at Home
customer_reviews.text: I have used the sushiquik regularly since the purchase. The sushi maker is indeed easy to use and produces restaurant quality sushi. The only thing I don't like is the green guide screen does not snap into place so it is constantly moving around when you are trying to spread the rice causing inconsistencies in the rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Baker

customer_reviews.title: Get a bamboo mat (for rolling) and be done with it
customer_reviews.text: The stand in which the mat attaches is flimsy, you’d do better not to use it. The frame to measure rice was unnecessary after my second roll. And the mold to cut works, but is equally unnecessary. I honestly ended up just using the mat and the rice spoon. Is not that this kit is bad, per se. It’s ok, but it comes with a lot of stuff that ends up being clutter in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kassick

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE! BAD PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly you would be better off with a bamboo starting mat kit! This product helped me learn but after a couple times I started to figure out what was wrong. It’s one hell of a bulky product, because of this your sushi will never be rolled tight enough. Sadly as well this product states dishwasher safe,LIES. The mat is but the black stand it has to stand got deformed and now I can’t use the set do to the white tab on the back of the mat. So I bought a bamboo mat and my sushi and life has been changed don’t waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: Coral Owens

customer_reviews.title: Make sushi like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: The amazing part though is the ingredients that are included in the box. Enough to prepare a meal for 12, with some left over, you will be wowed! As noted, there is some rice in the box – Japanese-style short grain rice, to be exact. You will surely want some more of that. Some toasted seaweed for rolling your rice is also supplied in the box, as well as Japanese rice vinegar, Japanese sushi vinegar, Japanese dark soy sauce, Japanese pickled ginger, and some powdered horseradish. This kit makes everything easy! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Dee

customer_reviews.title: The white rolling mat doesn't fit easily into the stand
customer_reviews.text: The white rolling mat doesn't fit easily into the stand. You have to practically break the white piece from the pressure. Also, the green guide doesn't fit properly on the mat. It won't sit flat, and it won't attach on the perimeter without the mat buckling. I will not be using this product and will seek a full refund. I make excellent rice rolls using plastic wrap and will probably continue doing it that way. I was hoping this product would make the process easier. Instead, I ended up with a pain in the rear item and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyesMN

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my daughter. She loves sushi! I decided to use it first and make sushi for her and I could not even use it. I read and reread the directions but I could not get the roller to roll. Not sure why it even has a stand. The frame was pointless. The cutting guide was useless. I ended up rolling the sushi by hand and cutting it without the guide. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: thombanjo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love my sushi maker! it was super easy to use making it perfect for beginners. I was unsure about how to make sushi rice and there was a perfect recipe for it in the instruction manual. Sushi was a big seller! The only reason why i gave it 4 stars was because when i unboxed it a couple of the links from the sushi roller were detached not sure if they are supposed to detach but i snapped it back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Leianah B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Sushi Kit
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I made our first sushi with this kit. It was easier than I thought it would be, and our California roll and Philly rolls came out really well. Tip: when using the cutting tool, squeeze it firmly around the sushi roll and it is easier to cut the roll. Very pleased with our first try, can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Lehr

customer_reviews.title: INSTANT SUSHI CHEF!
customer_reviews.text: BEST.THING.EVER. I felt like a master chef. I smiled. I giggled. I ran to the other room after making my first roll to tell my husband that I felt like an absolute champ and had purchased the coolest gadget in the world. Seriously though. There is no learning curve. There is no "first attempt." I was fully expecting to have a total disaster on my first shot...but no such thing happened. My first roll looked as awesome as my fifth. Follow the instructions (which are extremely clear and concise) and you, too, will find your inner sushi chef. Make sure you buy appropriate rice--actual sushi rice. The long-grain stuff that most Americans are used to won't work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: their advertising pictures are highly suggestive of including the white bowls.... Very disappointed the stand and the green matt are superlative, not needed you roll directly on the sushi nori / seaweed. and the plastic cups looking like plumbing parts. The green thing you squeeze and partition with are not needed either, you shape with the white rolling matt just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rayetta Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Easy Bake Oven Level
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap and light for the price. The different pieces move around to easily when making or cutting rolls. I actually cut the rolls a lot better without the plastic guide. Seems like a gimmick. You would probably be better off with a 5$ bamboo mat and a YouTube video. That being said if your cooking and knife skills leave something to be desired this could possibly be a better starter option.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool for homemade sushi
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my brother - along with some avocado, nori, crab... All the fixings for a California roll. The next morning we made the rolls. This little roller makes it very easy to make even rolls. It's super quick. Much easier than the bamboo rollers. He has since made much more than the basic California rolls. Easy clean up too.
customer_reviews.author: TishaTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my fiancee as a gift and it was a big hit. This works so much better for beginners than those push-tube sushi kits you see everywhere. The flat surface assembly works great and is very easy to use and gauge how much rice, fish, etc to add to each roll. I'd highly recommend this kit for any beginner just starting out with homemade sushi.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Boese

customer_reviews.title: Amazing simple delicious
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have used this already like 5 times. It does take a little practice to get the correct proportions but the instructions and tips really helped. The first time I filled way too much and left it rice on the inside and personally was not a big fan. After that I flipped it rice out and rolled it tighter and they have been amazing. Even the storage is great and looks amazing. This product was well worth it for me and i cannot wait to make more
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bellone

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, so I have not used the product. I had an issue with the box when it arrived, the product was not affected. I was disappointed about the presentation of my gift and reached out to the company. They responded immediately and with a solution that was above and beyond my expectations. Thank you SushiQuik😊
customer_reviews.author: T. Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners Sushi making set
customer_reviews.text: I have made Sushi before with A traditional bamboo roller but was looking for some thing that I could put into the dishwasher! Overall very happy with this set I especially appreciated the cutting guide that is honestly worth the price of getting this just in itself, because cutting sushi can be very difficult and this makes it pretty easy. The only thing I would change is maybe one of the advertisement pictures which shows a set of cups and chopsticks which do not come with this and wish the rolling base was a bit more sturdy. Maybe rubber grips to help with that. But overall a great way to learn to make Sushi! Had fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Did I receive a Knock-Off?
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure I received your product. The box said "isushi" on the outside and the training frame didn't have "top" despite what was noted in the instructions (printed in very tiny print and photos on the box, no other instructions, very difficult to read). The sushi mat kept breaking apart also. Furthermore, the training frame seemed warped and didn't fit very well on the mat. All parts were very flimsy and cheap for the price, I am hoping I received a false product, I returned it. I would have liked it if it were better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kid had been asking for a sushi mat for ages so I decided to get her this all in one product. She has made kimbap so far and loved it, and had a super easy time using it without direction from me, and she is twelve!
customer_reviews.author: Ceira Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and I love sushi but don’t really want to spend much time in public places these days... plus sushi is expensive. This tool kit and the instructions inside made me look like a pro my first try and we’ve been enjoying it since. The cooking instructions for the rice was spot on
customer_reviews.author: Mari C

customer_reviews.title: SushiQuick really does speed up the process
customer_reviews.text: We have been making sushi for years with the bamboo mat. We really loved this set because it made the whole process easier. The piece that holds and portions the sushi roll kept the uncut roll intact so the cutting process was faster and the finished pieces were uniform. Bonus: everything is dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: louise llewelyn

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garage
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a lot better. You're really better off rolling your own from original tools needed. Honestly it's not as easy as it looks. It's so light, when you press down the while thing comes apart. Would never order or recommend. I wouldn't even have it in my kitchen. Save your money, believe me
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Sushi Maker
customer_reviews.text: If you love sushi then you should for sure buy this ... Making your own sushi always tastes better and its loads of fun and with this sushi kit you can easily make your favorite sushi. In my house we always try making our own sushi but it never really comes out as planned :) Thats why we bought this set, Its super easy to use easy to roll doesnt get as messy and what I love the most is the sushi roll cutter that was always the hardest part... cutting the pieces evenly well this set is the bomb! Its so much fun to use and the sushi tastes amazing as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Works but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad as a Christmas present. I will say the kit is helpful, however, the recipe on the box verse inside on the pamphlet are different. This made it difficult to accurately make the sushi rice, which is the most important step...The rolling mat is good just as long as it doesn't fall apart on you when you are rolling the sushi. The slicing guard made it really easy to cut the sushi without it slipping all around and the tray was helpful when spreading the rice. Overall, the item is a little too flimsy for me, and I would not rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Siehara

customer_reviews.title: JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the most overrated piece of junk I've ever had the misfortune of buying. The rolls didn't hold together well, the white sushi mat constantly fell apart, and the green tube for slicing was too flimsy to even bother with. It's in the trash - I wouldn't even donate this piece of crap. Buy a regular sushi mat and be done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to use at first, the instructions are not very helpful at all. The instruction sheet came printed in an Asian language (I wouldn't know which one). After the first two rolls, I got the hang of it and I was able to make 5 more rolls. The last one was the best looking one. I spent more on the ingredients than what I would have paid for similar rolls at mygrocery store. The big plus is that you can keep your kids busy making rolls. My kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I looked on line and it got very good ratings. It may just be me but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked on line and it got very good ratings. It may just be me but it was just ok, my first attempt was not pretty.The guide to put down your rice was great and the guide to slice the roll was prefect that gave uniform bites. The base could be more stable and the sushi roller was just ok. I have only used this a few times and maybe just need to keep working at it. I am going out to buy the bamboo roller and see if this might be easier to roll my sushi.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shuey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing time saver
customer_reviews.text: My favorite items in this entire thing are the spaced cutting mold and the rice spoon. Easiest non stick rice spreader I’ve ever used. I can now make sushi once a week without much hassle or time taken up. I use to handroll sushi and it took me so long to make anything. This product is amazing, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: not the best.
customer_reviews.text: The detachable sushi mat does not stay on the stand and it has a plastic knob on the back, making it impossible to use it without the stand. The frame makes it so that you cannot get rice to all the sides. The non-stick paddle works, but I ended up using my hands for most of it. If you can cut a straight line, you don't need the SushiQuick Roller. I am no expert; I did not make sushi before purchasing this kit. I used this kit a few times before going to Target to purchase a plain bamboo mat. Save yourself $25, a plain bamboo mat is easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love sushi and I thought it would be something fun for us to do together. We had a blast, easy to do and it came with a great sushi rice recipe. I love it so much I’ve bought it as a gift for my son and his fiancé.
customer_reviews.author: ty d

customer_reviews.title: Great set complete with items (but not a complete set)!
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I had a blast making kimbap with my toddler. The one comment I will make is that at the price point, I thought that it would have bamboo rolling mats. Not a big deal as all the included components are great, but it is an super easy making kit complete with items... not a super easy making complete kit. Five stars if it had bamboo rolling mats (or if I had reading comprehension skills haha)!
customer_reviews.author: BK Y.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a sushi kit - this is the way to go. It was so easy to use. Both myself and my 9yr daughtered mastered it the very 1st time we tried. Easy to clean. Have been recommending it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great sushi maker!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sushi maker! I love California Rolls but thought they were to difficult to make. I was wrong! Easy easy! I have family visiting next week and can't wait to make some for them. They turned out perfect the first time! I made them with rice on the outside so I flipped the rice over and put Saran Wrap on the base and rolled it up. A little soy sauce/wasabi on the side and your good to go! Easy instructions included. I plan on giving a few to family and friends for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a bamboo mat...not rocket science.
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses I realized I would have been much better off just buying a simple bamboo mat. The plastic platform and mat are awkward to use and you end up with 6 odd shaped plastic parts to store somewhere in a kitchen drawer. Product quality is fine...but you will likely conclude this was not as necessary as you thought it was going to be to making sushi.
customer_reviews.author: R. Makanji

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not simple enough
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product made making the sushi rolls more complicated than it needed to be. I should’ve just bought a bamboo roller. That said, it is easy to clean and does what it was advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Casey

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly. I could not use the slicer guide for an inside out sushi roll, but all the rest worked great. I love the plastic mat - it worked wonderfully and I didn't relish dealing with bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Shdonna

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, but a few design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this 5 stars except for a couple of design elements...one being the plastic "stand" you roll your sushi rolls on is narrow and you have a balancing act to do in the middle of it (structurally speaking). Also the tool which allows you to cut the sushi roll into circles doesn't let you let go of the roll very easily. Sometimes the roll will tear or come apart because you are trying to open the bottom part wide enough for the sushi roll to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Leena C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not dishwash
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to receive and made making sushi for the first time really fun and enjoyable. Came with instruction pointers for cooking the rice and I made some fantastic sushi rolls thanks to it. Thought it was dishwasher safe and have warped parts after the first use. Very frustrated that was the case but super stoked it worked as well as it did for the 4 sushi rolls I made with the wife and guests. Impressed everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: Good concept. But it's a fight to roll sushi So we just makes poke bowls or go buy sushi now
customer_reviews.author: Shaun H & Family

customer_reviews.title: Just be sure to put plastic wrap between the roller and the seaweed.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical how much difference this simple set of cheap equipment would make in my sushi game, but after getting used to it, it actually helped quite a lot. Like so many elements of Japanese culture, sushi is very conceptually simple, but actually doing a good job making it is surprisingly difficult. The right tools make all the difference, and this kit can, if properly used, drastically improve the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi K-R

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: While the product is of great quality. I honestly stopped using while I was making sushi,to me a simple bambo mat will be enough. The actual kit seemed to be a waste for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shakema

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought this for my husband who loves sushi and wanted to make a day out of it. I make it without the tools easily, but these tools don’t help all that much. The roll does not fit in the cutting thing and it makes it harder to cut. But he says after a while you get the hang of it!
customer_reviews.author: Bsc2018

customer_reviews.title: It's not "super-easy"
customer_reviews.text: After many attempts with the plastic mat and "training frame" to roll sushi on, I finally got a bamboo mat which works much better. I learned a lot more from watching tutorial videos on u-tube and practice. Save your money and learn from the best home sushi makers and it's free all on your computer. Just invest in the bamboo mat, watch the videos "How to roll Sushi", and find the right recipe for your taste for making the sticky rice. With the right tools and ingredients, it's fun and yum!
customer_reviews.author: Zuzy

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool!
customer_reviews.text: First timer - Works great! Easy to youtube a few how-to help videos for finishing tips, great way to make good quality sushi. I think the only limiting factor is my own choice of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Just order a bamboo roll.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok starter kit but it isn’t easy to use and I wish I would have just ordered a bamboo one. The platform doesn’t help much and the roller falls off it pretty easily which makes a mess. I do like the way the cutting piece works. It’s really easy to cut with it.
customer_reviews.author: IceIceKenny

customer_reviews.title: but can be helpful for sure for someone who doesn't horde kitchen supplies like I do
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Lots of little pieces I don't really use, but can be helpful for sure for someone who doesn't horde kitchen supplies like I do. The only complaint I have - and it could be more on my end - is getting the roll super tight. They come out loose for me. But again - it could be my error. I love being able to make sushi on the fly. I am happy that I got this one!
customer_reviews.author: joy l jewell

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast sushi in your own home!
customer_reviews.text: The Sushiquick makes making your own sushi at home easy and fun. The rolling mat is easy to use and the rice guide tray definitely helps with ensuring that you have the proper amount of rice each time.
customer_reviews.author: N. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Freaking love this!
customer_reviews.text: For an uncoordinated at home cook, I thought I could never make sushi rolls. I can now, and easily. We had a sushi roll night for dinner in the snowmaggedon blizzard & had fun using this. Its very easy to clean & even better dishwasher top rack safe. Would make a great gift for a sushi lover too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love sushi. I decided to practice my sushi skills on the sly so I can surprise him for Valentines day. This kit was easy to use and honestly better than the last one I bought (the mat was splitter).. The rolls turned out a little loose due to user error 😆🤣 My only real issue was the recipe for the sushi rice. It was too vinegary. But that is an easy fix. I highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I spend more time making the best rice and ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. I have rolled a dozen or so rolls with no rejects. I spend more time making the best rice and ingredients. I am disappointed it did not come with the knife shown on many pictures. Other than that it almost feels like cheating. Probably because it is. The cutter tool really helps with my fatal flaw of cutting even pieces without tearing it apart. The rice spoon is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt A.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to make Sushi if the Sushi Rolling mat is broken
customer_reviews.text: I received this and was excited to use it. Second time I used it, sushi rolling mat came apart. Every time I try to use I now, the mat keeps coming apart. Have contacted the Sushiquik company three times since then. Have not heard one word from them. Customer service doesn’t appear to be very good. It is hard to make Sushi when the Sushi Rolling mat is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Would like more recipes for device. The devisees are almost self explanatory. Everything fits well together. I did order a wonderful book on sushi. I will look at your eBook for more recipes and more sauces? Thanks again for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This was a very flimsy kind of a sad excuse for a beginner to buy. No matter what you cannot roll your sushi beautifully. I recommend getting the real deal. It’s a lot cheaper and does a much much better job.
customer_reviews.author: GBHARD

customer_reviews.title: Very clever and practical way to get started making sushi!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so amazing. I have tried to make sushi before and failed miserably. The instructions are great and I find the whole concept to be extremely clever. I love that it's dishwasher safe. I would consider this an extremely practical way of having sushi "training wheels". I thought it would take me many attempts to get sushi that was even edible. With this kit, I have made better sushi than I have had at some sushi restaurants, on my first try! My wife told me that I should become a sushi chef now...definitely not going to happen! But, this kit will get you on the right track!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Moran

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to roll
customer_reviews.text: Love this concept! However, the plastic rolling mat is difficult to use on the stand. It is wobbly and makes it hard to spread the rice. Also , he green cups are not useful. I will have to figure out a different set up next time. I've made sushi twice already and my family is loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Slifka

customer_reviews.title: Great For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy I invested in this kit. I was paying $5 per roll whenever I bought sushi from a local store. I figured I should teach myself how to make sushi. This makes it fool proof, and I'm saving a lot of money on lunches now by making my own sushi.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great for a novice!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect fit for a novice sushi chef. It's simple to use and easy to wash. I love the rice mat and guide. It makes it easy to portion the rice. If you're serious about sushi, you'll outgrow this kit in a couple of months- but that's the goal! If you want to make sushi with kids, this is also the perfect kit.
customer_reviews.author: Faie

customer_reviews.title: Child like
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled, without demage, would be great for kids who have an interest in learning to make sushi or toy for a toy kitchen
customer_reviews.author: t bates

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome !! Easy to use and made awesome sushi rolls !! We had so much fun making our own sushi !
customer_reviews.author: Cortnie Gier

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than we thought it would and has been good ...
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than we thought it would and has been good entertainment when we have dinner parties. Everyone can get involved and make what they want and keeps the conversation going.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: This kit makes it pretty easy to make sushi
customer_reviews.text: This kit makes it pretty easy to make sushi. Don't expect restaurant quality, but it is fairly easy to get semi-tight rolls, although it is hard to make rolls that have lots of ingredients or are very big. Overall, I would recommend this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for making sushi!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time this evening. It really helped make the sushi making process faster and easier compared to the way I had been doing it. Very pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Louvierre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit for an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: The easiest and the best sushi I have ever made. The steps are very easy to follow and everyone in your household can make sushi with this kit. It makes great sushi every time. It's also very fun to make. I would recommend this to anyone who would like to learn to make their own sushi.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to use as expected. Better to use a traditional bamboo mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yup, its sushi, and quick!!!
customer_reviews.text: SWEET JESUS!!! I never thought sushi could be so fast, but hot damn was I wrong! As soon as I opened the package I was inundated with a plethora of steaming cold sushi! So much in fact that I had to flee my home because of the mounds of sushi produced by this contraption. My whole town reeks and my neighbors all hate me! THANKS SUSHIQUICK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: james guerin

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised on how easy it was to use
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised on how easy it was to use, I viewed alot of videos on You Tube, before I decided to purchase it. I keep it out all the time it has found a permanent place on my counter, I don't want to put it away. You know what they say "Out of sight Out of mind".
customer_reviews.author: Cheftiggs

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been eating sushi for a year now and decided it was time to try making it ourselves. I found this kit through another product's review and decided to purchase it. I'm so glad that I did! The instructions were very helpful and the kit is very easy to use. We're about to make our 3rd night of sushi on it tonight and we've loved it so far! The rolls come out nice and tight if you do it correctly. Attached some pictures from our first time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's so easy to make my own sushi now at home and save money! Would absolutely recommend this product to anyone wanting to try to make their own sushi for the first time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great sushi kit, and not just for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sushi kit. There are parts that aren't really necessary but why not. The guid is pretty cool, the guid to cut the sushi in the same exact size is THE winner! Sushi come out prettt neat, same size and clean 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Atena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with NO waste!
customer_reviews.text: This sushi making kit is very easy to use and I love that it does not require using plastic wrap with each use. The item is also dishwasher safe! It did a great job. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TammyRN

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for my kids to try rolling sushi. It has some good pieces and they are able to make some nice looking rolls. It is made of plastic though, and some pieces have broke/cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: It says for beginners but
customer_reviews.text: Just get bamboo mats, the plastic thing that comes in this doesn’t roll tight and just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Made it easy for a first timer
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious after reading some of the reviews. This was my first time making sushi and they came out fine, just a little big since I used too much rice. The base is a bit wobbly if you apply too much pressure but I found it super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I'm so in love with my new Brieftons Spiralizar
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with my new Brieftons Spiralizar. I am doing raw foods and this is allowing me so much creativity with my meals. Great product at reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Anta Panta

customer_reviews.title: Works great for kids and adults alike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 8 year old nephew (he asked for a sushi kit for Christmas). He was able to make a decent looking roll on the first try. His second roll was much better. It's a little difficult to get a tight roll, but the rice spreading and roll cutting guides are very helpful for beginners. It takes a little coordination to keep the rice guide to stay in place at first. However, rice did not stick to the paddle, which is very helpful. Overall, it feels like a quality product. Seeing my nephew's huge smile and pride at making sushi the first time made this kit well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Sushi
customer_reviews.text: As you get better at it you learn that some of the items are not needed. But good to get started
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Sushi
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this product, it made my sushi look like it came from some restaurant or store. The sushi looked beautiful, and tasted wonderful. The only complaint I had was that it's very hard to clean, but on the plus side, it is easier to clean than the bamboo sushi matt.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M. Seymour-Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Delightful date night!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I feel like sushi ninjas! We haven't tried with actual fish yet... That is scary but we ROCK at vegetable rolls! This kit is pretty idiot proof... That being said the first time we tried we realized we set it up backwards so that was fun! We had a great time on our date night with this product and would heartily recommend it to anyone who can't afford a weekly sushi restaurant bill :-) ....
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Christen

customer_reviews.title: Cool sushi kit! Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with everything you need to make sushi. Once you understand how to assemble and use the product it's super simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Decherakd

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! I love how I can just pop it in in the morning and forget about it till I’m ready to cook it. No hassle or mess, easy to clean. Allows me to cook the tofu so much quicker since it presses way more water out then using a cheese cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Not for starters
customer_reviews.text: You really need to already know how to make sushi before buying this. Lots of parts, lots to clean read the manual
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a First-Timer
customer_reviews.text: This kit is fantastic for a first time sushi maker! It’s been really easy and we’ve been having so much fun with it. Super easy to clean, too. Eventually, we’ll graduate to a traditional sushi kit, but for now, this is great for training.
customer_reviews.author: J. Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. Just like other reviews mentioned, the rice spoon is great and doesn't stick. This sushi making kit makes me feel like a pro sushi maker. The only thing I would change is the soy sauce cups.. They are very deep. I used a little dish I already had at home. It all rolls up and stores very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G-H

customer_reviews.title: Who knew it's easy to make sushi!!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest sushi maker ever! Never made sushi before & always wanted to try. I purchased this kit and was so happy! My suggestion is using a rice cooker for the rice. The rice was hardest part. I struggled the first couple of times and bought a rice cooker and it made it so much easier and better. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gil Miguel

customer_reviews.title: I got this kit on a whim to see if he'd like it. It almost tripled his productivity and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Every month my brother makes sushi from scratch. And I always watch as he spends hours doing everything. I got this kit on a whim to see if he'd like it. It almost tripled his productivity and the rolls all came out beautifully. It took a little finesse to get them right at first but after that it was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Firefighter

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to learn how to make Sushi and this was the perfect kit for him
customer_reviews.author: Maysoun Al Tabbaa

customer_reviews.title: TUNA PARTY !
customer_reviews.text: Caught a bunch of tuna this year so I bought this item to try my hand at making sushi rolls. It makes the process easy for any beginner. We are still improving our rolls as far as presentation. I have only purchased one of these so far. I am considering purchasing another so two people can make rolls at the same time. This item does indeed make the process fun but 2 of them would make sushi parties even better. Would purchase this item again
customer_reviews.author: The big MF

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for beginners like me
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe, easy for beginners, and even has instructions. I've had it for mo ths and it still looks the same as it did when it arrived, and I make sushi at least once a week. I didn't know how to make sushi until buying this, and it helped me make sushi easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Howard

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: I know that there are a tone of gimmick products out there, but I got this for my daughter and her boyfriend, and they have used it 5 times since Christmas! We know how to make Sushi, but she said this just makes the process easier so you can enjoy more!! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Symber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sushi kit. It is not difficult to use. Now I can make my own. Great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit. Anyone can make perfect rolls with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Shackelton

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This little sushi kit is so great and easy to use. Definitely a great item to have in the kitchen if you are a huge sushi fan.
customer_reviews.author: Topaz111

customer_reviews.title: Cool shushi maker!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for plastic sushi maker and found that one. great product, easy to use, love using this!
customer_reviews.author: Amir Garousi

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to use. Our rolls came out kind of wonky!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie phillips

customer_reviews.title: Its ok for someone who's REALLY afraid to get in ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for someone who's REALLY afraid to get in the kitchen. It's a little cheesy looking. I made the mistake though. Not again. I bought the bamboo mat.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Simple recipes to be used by beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 8 year old grandson and we have had fun sushi dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to make rolls with my kids! Enjoyed it very much
customer_reviews.author: Sona B.

customer_reviews.title: I do however recommend not filling to the top of the green
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well! i've never even thought of making sushi at home and this helped me do it very well for the first time! I do however recommend not filling to the top of the green,, Rice,, level thing? (Sorry can't remember the name currently) but filling it as it says is a little too much. Beyond that it's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Shelnutt

product_meta.title: SushiQuik Sushi Making Kit Complete Sushi Set, Roll Cutter, Rice Paddle, Pre-Measured Rice Frame and How to Videos
product_meta.description: We designed our kit so everyone can make a sushi roll the very first time. We took all the guess work out of it. The hardest thing to do as a beginner is to spread the right amount of rice. That's why we designed our training frame which measures exactly the amount of rice you need to make a perfect role. We also designed our non-stick rice paddle to help you spread the rice along the training frame. The last thing you need as a beginner is dealing with sticky rice all over your fingers as your trying to spread the rice. Then once the roll is made, cutting the roll evenly can be challenging for beginners. So we created the SushiQuik Roll Cutter which let's you evenly cut your rolls while saving your fingers. To enjoy your rolls, we turned the end caps into soy sauce holders! And then once your done having your sushi party, we designed the rolling mat to snap apart so that you can easily place it in the dishwasher along with your silverware. Our whole kit is dishwasher safe, so no worries! We know you will love this kit. The whole family will have fun making sushi!
feature_bullets: Easiest and most complete sushi making kit on the market
